Class myUtil

java.lang.Object
myUtil
public final class myUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This is Utility class for unimelb SWEN20003 2020s2 assignment 2

Simple simulation of a fictional universe

Created on 9/18/2020

    • exitGame

      public static void exitGame​(int tickCount, java.util.ArrayList<Actor> actors)
      Terminate current running simulation normally. And print the amount of fruit at each stockpile and hoard, in the order they appear in the world file.
      Parameters:
      tickCount - The number of ticks the simulation went through
      actors - List reference to all actors
